description:
This is the best presidential announcement!










 


 















 
 
	This gospel choir, Selected of God, sang a medley of songs including Eminem's "Lose Yourself."

title: Gospel Choir Sings Eminem's "Lose Yourself" At Ben Carson's Presidential Announcement
